page.title: 17Wivelsfield - Trade
page.content:
Most of the trade in the area is in {retail and services.
World's End has a variety of{shops including food-shops, newsagents, a launderette, a fish and chip shop, an off licence,a bakery,a betting shop, a radio and TV shop and a Post Office. The village of Wivelsfield Green has a Post Office / General Stores,one other food shop,a hairdresser and a hardware shop / builders' merchants.
The three{garages}in the village have dealer franchises for the sales of new and second-hand cars. One of the garages also runs a thriving self-drive van hire company.
The{abbatoir}delivers meat,sells skins for tanning, fat and bones for soap and blood to the local council.
